sections.heading: Noncompliance not to affect validity of loan6-985
sections.text: Noncompliance not to affect validity of loanA failure to comply with a provision of this article does not affect the validity or enforceability of any debt or any mortgage, deed of trust or lien interest on real estate. A person who acquires a commer
